analysis.key_quote: What is going on in OUR GOVERNMENT?! It seems that the 32% that put Trump in office are dismissing the values, needs and rule of law in their wielding of presumed power.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses general political frustration and criticism of Trump and Congress without addressing the specific issues related to the proposed rule on Schedule F or civil service protections. Therefore, it does not clearly support or oppose the rule.
